Uses of Interface
net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api.concern.Security

  • Packages that use Security 
    Package Description
    net.sf.mmm.service.api
    Contains the API for simple remote invocations to communicate between client and server.
    net.sf.mmm.service.base.server
    Contains the server-specific base classes for simple remote services.
    net.sf.mmm.service.impl.server
    Contains the server-specific implementation classes for simple remote invocations.
    net.sf.mmm.util.exception.api
    Provides the API for utilities that help to deal with exceptions.
    net.sf.mmm.util.exception.base
    Contains public implementations of exception-utilities.
    net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api
    Provides the API for utilities of general purpose.
    net.sf.mmm.util.security.api
    Provides the API to help with security.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.service.api

      Subinterfaces of Security in net.sf.mmm.service.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CsrfToken
      This is the interface for a security token to prevent cross site request forgery (CSRF) and potentially other attacks.
      Classes in net.sf.mmm.service.api that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultCsrfToken
      This is the default implementation of CsrfToken it simply uses a string value as payload.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.service.base.server

      Subinterfaces of Security in net.sf.mmm.service.base.server 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CsrfTokenManager
      This is the interface for the manager of CsrfTokens.
      Classes in net.sf.mmm.service.base.server that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCsrfTokenManager
      This is the abstract base implementation of CsrfTokenManager.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.service.impl.server

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.service.impl.server that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CsrfTokenManagerDefaultImpl
      This is the default implementation of CsrfTokenManager.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.util.exception.api

      Subinterfaces of Security in net.sf.mmm.util.exception.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ExceptionUtil
      This is the interface for a collection of utility functions to deal with exceptions (Throwables).

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.util.exception.base

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.util.exception.base that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExceptionUtilImpl
      This is the default implementation of ExceptionUtil.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.util.lang.api that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Password
      This is the Datatype used to store a simple password as String.

    • Uses of Security in net.sf.mmm.util.security.api

      Classes in net.sf.mmm.util.security.api that implement Security 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SecurityErrorUserException
      This exception is thrown if an operation or invocation failed due to security restrictions.
